subject: Disabling Inherited Tests
msgSnippet: Hi, I ve created a SetupTest class that just performs setup, but also tests the setup. So when other test classes inherit from it, the inherited tests run each
messageBody:
Hi,

I've created
a SetupTest class
that just performs setup,
but also tests the setup.

So when other test
classes inherit from it,
the inherited tests run
each time.

Anyone know if I can disable the inherited tests?

Thanks,
- Ole
